title: Gamification-Based Financial Literacy Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic economic concepts and mathematical calculation skills
context.additional_context: A short intensive PBL (Project-Based Learning) course combining gamification and multimedia content via personal smartphones, targeting students/job seekers to strengthen real-life financial problem-solving skills.

learning_goals: Learners can construct virtual portfolios by comparing at least three investment products (stocks/bonds/funds)
Learners can achieve over 80% monthly income-expense balance through simulation-based budget management games
Learners can explain interest calculation principles to peers through team-produced financial education videos

resources: Gamified finance apps (e.g., Investopedia, Savings Spree)
Virtual investment simulation platform (Stock Market Game)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
